Posts.Content: WestintheEast wrote: Can survivors and current strong ladies battling cancer tell me if one of their initial symptoms was a rash on the areola that spread outward? I've had a rash for a week now, doc said put hydrocortisone cream on it and call in three days with current state. So far the cream has done nothing and now there is an inner burning sensation. Wondering if I should get a second opinion? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Areola Rash WestintheEast mustlovepoodles
